metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6616 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The mov_text_decode_frame function in libavcodec/movtextdec.c in FFmpegbefore 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and crash) via crafted 3GPP TS 26.245 data.

criterions.comment: oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mythtv package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
